title: HubSpot Account Cleanup and Custom Setup
job_overview:
Project goal
Optimize and customize HubSpot account for efficient sales and marketing operations.

Scope of work
- Audit current setup for unused or duplicate properties and lists.
- Adjust user permissions and notifications.
- Align settings with best practices.
- Create 2-3 sales pipelines with basic setup and 1-2 light automations.
- Build 3-4 dashboards including sales, marketing, and Google Analytics insights.
- Create 3-4 forms for sales intake, case study submission, reviews, and contact.
- Set up related workflows including team notifications and follow-ups.
- Conduct two 60-minute calls to initiate and finalize the project.

Read more

Additional information
- Looking for HubSpot Pro/Enterprise experience with strong skills in forms, workflows, pipelines, and dashboards.

CRM software
HubSpot
